name: Christian Janiesch
content: Prof. Dr. Christian Janiesch - EC - TU Dortmund To path indicator Subpages of “Team“ To navigation To quick access To footer with other services To content Department of Computer Science Office hours by arrangement Directions Main Positions Research Associate, Institute for Information Systems, Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster and European Research Center for Information Systems (ERCIS) Senior Researcher, SAP Research Center of SAP Australia Pty Ltd in Brisbane, Australia Postdoc, Institute for Applied Informatics and Formal Description Methods, Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT), Karlsruhe, Germany Juniorprofessor for Information Management, Julius-Maximilians-University of Würzburg, Germany Research Interests Artificial Intelligence in Management & Explainable and Trustworthy AI Business Analytics & Process Analytics Business Process Management & Robotic Process Automation Conceptual Modeling/ Meta Modeling/ Method Engineering Design Science Research Digitalization & Cloud Computing (Industrial) Internet of Things & Cyber-physical Systems Smart Service Systems Selected Publications Feuerriegel, S., Hartmann, J., Janiesch, C., & Zschech, P.
